#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std ;
int main()
{
   long long int n,i,k,j,temp,l,count,flag,n1,m;
   // cin>>t;
   char c[15];
   cin>>c;
    while(strcmp(c,"#")!=0)
    {
                           l=strlen(c);
m=1;
n=0;
for(i=l-1;i>=0;i--)
{
  n=n+(c[i]-48)*m;
m=m*10;  
}
                    flag=0;
                    temp=9;
       n1=n;
       j=1;
       count=0;             
       while(n1!=0)
       {
         if(n1>temp*j)
         {
                      
              n1=n1-temp*j;
              count=count+temp;
              temp=temp*10;
              j++;     
         }
         else
         {
              if(n1%j==0)
              {
                 count=count+n1/j;
              }
              else
              {
                  flag=1;
              }
              n1=0;
         }
       }
       if(flag==0)
         cout<<count<<endl;
       else
       cout<<"Impossible!"<<endl;
      
       cin>>c;
    }
    return 0;
}
